name: Moonbase Down (itch)
description:
After retrieving an unknown object from the Asteroid belt in the amazing year 2184, all contact is lost with Moonbase One. You have been sent to investigate the complex and recover the ten crew logs.

Moonbase Down is a Sci-Fi survival horror game with rogue-like elements. You will need to manage Power & Ammo levels to escape each floor and avoid the woes of Alien impregnation...

Steam Reviews

“Alien boiled down to its basic elements... Atmospheric as balls and well worth the 2 quid asking price.” -Ramarl

“As soon as you kick in to the game you can already tell this developer is looking to make a professional and fun little arcade game." -Gat

Core Features

  • Fight or Flight
  • 10-Floors of Randomized Moonbase
  • 7-Xenomorph Types
  • Experience the Alien Life Cycle
  • Dangerous A.I.
  • Force Field, Pulse Rifle, & Stasis Mines
  • Limited Ammo
  • 60-FPS Greenscreen
  • Rescue Jonesy the Cat!

*By purchasing MBD you agree to the AdventRPG EULA.

**Itch.io release does not include a Steam key for Sandbox mode Early Access.
